alert.note: Alert for Northern Lycoming; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:10PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL LYCOMING AND SOUTHEASTERN CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 309 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lock Haven, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Avis and Carroll around 315 PM EDT. Jersey Shore around 320 PM EDT. Collomsville around 325 PM EDT. Elimsport around 330 PM EDT. Williamsport, Duboistown and Cogan Station around 335 PM EDT. Montoursville, Loyalsockville and Montgomery around 340 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Garden View, Oval, Loganton, South Williamsport and Lock Haven University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lycoming; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming
